content: SIW 10-22 ¾” high-torque cordless impact wrench Ultimate-class, high-torque cordless impact wrench with ¾” anvil and friction ring for heavy bolting and anchoring ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features Advanced cordless performance – heavy-duty cordless impact wrench offers higher torque and greater power in a more compact body Designed to last – robust brushless motor and ¾” anvil contribute to the durability and consistent performance of our cordless impact wrenches On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise, thanks to longer-lasting batteries, time-saving accessories and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Loosening large rusty bolts for maintenance, operation and repair work Bolting structural steel connections, pipe flanges, equipment, 1/2”to 1 1/8” diameter structural bolts ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anvil type: 3/4 through hole with friction ring Maximum torque: 627 ft-lbs (1); 1180 ft-lbs (2) Nut busting torque: 1475 ft-lbs Technical Data | Anvil type | 3/4 through hole with friction ring | Maximum torque | 627 ft-lbs (1); 1180 ft-lbs (2) | 1 | Nut busting torque | 1475 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 2500 impacts/minute | Number of gears | 2 | No load RPM | gear 1: 1000 rpm; gear 2: 1250 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 8-17/32 x 3-3/8 x 9-1/4 in | Tool body weight | 6.4 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 100 dB (A) | 2 | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2361534 - SIW 10-22 3/4 Cordless impact wrench - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 10-22 Cordl. imp. wrench
